iUSi6tyP51MDWTf6uh7nPQ.text: Best service, hands down the kindest woman I have met in the U.K.! Delicious and cheap eats, with a one of kind atmosphere.   It's amazing, for Fox Sake :)

ozamdqQszAG6WsJe0zxIzg.text: What a lovely little shop with some excellent vegan sandwiches. The woman who runs the shop was really kind and I will definitely be back.

lVrbG7KHNpKGDJGdsKB1rQ.text: Everything about my experience with this adorable deli was top-notch. I went in because I love foxes and thought the decor was fantastic. Once inside, however, I couldn't help but buy a Bounty Bar traybake and some of the fabulous soup: today's offering was some lovely thai green curry chicken noodle soup, and it was delightful. I went home with a toasted roll as well, due to the owner's sweet generosity (they were closing soon and sent me home with a roll to try!). Not only was the food delicious and surprisingly inexpensive, the owner and her darling daughter were a delight. They got wind of the fact that I'd not been able to find a Highland dance class in the area on my brief visit and went so far as to make a few calls for me, to work something out! I couldn't believe the generous spirit, kindness, and down-to-earth goodness of both ladies. Thank you for everything and I wish you all the best! Anyone reading: go as quick as you can to the Little Fox Deli, I am certain you will be just as charmed as I was!
